TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDockProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取，這些控制項可以在停駐容器內公開其停駐屬性。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 不會公開停駐容器的任何屬性或可能會停駐在停駐容器內與目前控制項相鄰的任何的控制項屬性。 does not expose any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that may be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container. 停駐控制項相對於其他根據其目前疊置順序。較高的疊置順序放置進一步疊置停駐容器的指定邊緣。Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DockPosition As DockPosition
public: property System::Windows::Automation::DockPosition DockPosition { System::Windows::Automation::DockPosition get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項在停駐容器內的目前 。

span.span: Gets the current of the control within a docking container.

value.span: 控制項的 ，相對於停駐容器的界限及容器內其他項目。

span.span: The of the control, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDockPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition dockPosition) cil managed

param.name: dockPosition
param.span: 相對於停駐容器界限及容器內其他項目的停駐位置。

span.span: The dock position, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

summary.span: 將控制項停駐於停駐容器內。

span.span: Docks the control within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停駐容器是可讓排列子系的項目，以水平和垂直方向，相對於停駐容器與容器內的其他項目的界限的控制項。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
